SEARCH
Module sc2002OOP
Package sc2002OOP.obj.internshipopportunity

Class InternshipOpportunityManager

java.lang.Object
sc2002OOP.obj.internshipopportunity.InternshipOpportunityManager
public class InternshipOpportunityManager extends Object

Internship Opportunity Data Manager

This class serves as the dedicated manager for all InternshipOpportunity objects within the IPMS. It is responsible for initializing the data store, handling persistence (saving and loading), and managing unique opportunity IDs.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Kee Kai Wen, Kelvin Tay Wei Jie, Koay Jun Zhi, Lim Jia Wei Jerald, Teo Kai Jie
See Also:
  • InternshipOpportunity
  • InternshipApplicationManager

  • Method Details

    • getNextIDAndIncrement

      public static int getNextIDAndIncrement()
      Retrieves the next available sequential opportunity ID and then increments the internal counter. This is used for generating new unique opportunity IDs upon creation.
      Returns:
      The current value of lastID before incrementing.

    • getInstance

      public static InternshipOpportunityManager getInstance()
      Retrieves the singleton instance of the InternshipOpportunityManager. If the instance does not exist, it loads opportunity data from the file and creates the instance.
      Returns:
      The single instance of the InternshipOpportunityManager.

    • close

      public static void close()
      Saves the current list of internship opportunities to the file and destroys the singleton instance. This method should be called before the application closes to ensure data persistence.

    • retrieveInternshipOpps

      public static ArrayList<InternshipOpportunity> retrieveInternshipOpps()
      Reads and deserializes the InternshipOpportunity list from the persistent storage file.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all loaded InternshipOpportunity objects, or an empty list if the file is empty or an error occurs.

    • saveInternshipOpps

      public static void saveInternshipOpps(ArrayList<InternshipOpportunity> iOpps)
      Serializes and writes the current list of InternshipOpportunity objects to the persistent storage file.
      Parameters:
      iOpps - The ArrayList of InternshipOpportunity objects to be saved.

    • countSuccessFreqs

      public static Map<String,Integer> countSuccessFreqs()
      Counts the frequency of applications with an ACCEPTED status for each internship ID. This helper function is used to determine which internships are potentially filled.
      Returns:
      A Map where the key is the Internship ID and the value is the count of accepted applications.

    • updateFilledPlaces

      public static void updateFilledPlaces()
      Updates the status of internship opportunities to FILLED if the number of accepted applications meets or exceeds the number of available slots.

    • getInternshipOpps

      public static ArrayList<InternshipOpportunity> getInternshipOpps(String internshipID, String title, String description, String companyID, String preferredMajors, InternshipOpportunityLevel level, InternshipOpportunityStatus status, Boolean visibility, LocalDate openingDateFrom, LocalDate openingDateTo, LocalDate closingDateFrom, LocalDate closingDateTo)
      Filters the entire list of Internship Opportunities based on a set of optional criteria, where status and level filters are limited to a single value. If a filter parameter is null or empty, it is ignored.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - Optional filter for the opportunity's unique ID (partial match allowed).
      title - Optional filter for the title (partial match allowed).
      description - Optional filter for the description (partial match allowed).
      companyID - Optional filter for the company's ID (partial match allowed).
      preferredMajors - Optional filter for the preferred major (partial match allowed).
      level - Optional filter for the required level (single value).
      status - Optional filter for the administrative status (single value).
      visibility - Optional filter for student visibility (true/false).
      openingDateFrom - Optional start date for the opening date range.
      openingDateTo - Optional end date for the opening date range.
      closingDateFrom - Optional start date for the closing date range.
      closingDateTo - Optional end date for the closing date range.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of InternshipOpportunity objects matching the criteria.
      See Also:
      • getInternshipOpps(String, String, String, String, String, InternshipOpportunityLevel[], InternshipOpportunityStatus[], Boolean, LocalDate, LocalDate, LocalDate, LocalDate)

    • getInternshipOpps

      public static ArrayList<InternshipOpportunity> getInternshipOpps(String internshipID, String title, String description, String companyID, String preferredMajors, InternshipOpportunityLevel[] level, InternshipOpportunityStatus[] status, Boolean visibility, LocalDate openingDateFrom, LocalDate openingDateTo, LocalDate closingDateFrom, LocalDate closingDateTo)
      Filters the entire list of Internship Opportunities based on a set of optional criteria, allowing for multiple values for level and status filters. If a filter parameter is null or empty, it is ignored. The results are sorted by title.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - Optional filter for the opportunity's unique ID (partial match allowed).
      title - Optional filter for the title (partial match allowed).
      description - Optional filter for the description (partial match allowed).
      companyID - Optional filter for the company's ID (partial match allowed).
      preferredMajors - Optional filter for the preferred major (partial match allowed).
      level - An array of required levels to match (multiple values allowed).
      status - An array of administrative statuses to match (multiple values allowed).
      visibility - Optional filter for student visibility (true/false).
      openingDateFrom - Optional start date for the opening date range.
      openingDateTo - Optional end date for the opening date range.
      closingDateFrom - Optional start date for the closing date range.
      closingDateTo - Optional end date for the closing date range.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of InternshipOpportunity objects matching the criteria, sorted by title.
      See Also:
      • getInternshipOpps(String, String, String, String, String, InternshipOpportunityLevel, InternshipOpportunityStatus, Boolean, LocalDate, LocalDate, LocalDate, LocalDate)

    • getInternshipOpps

      public static ArrayList<InternshipOpportunity> getInternshipOpps()
      Retrieves the complete list of all InternshipOpportunity entities currently managed in memory.
      Returns:
      The ArrayList of all internship opportunities.

    • getInternshipOppByID

      public static InternshipOpportunity getInternshipOppByID(String internshipID)
      Retrieves a specific Internship Opportunity by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The unique ID of the opportunity to find.
      Returns:
      The matching InternshipOpportunity object, or null if no opportunity with the given ID exists.

    • setInternshipOpps

      public static void setInternshipOpps(ArrayList<InternshipOpportunity> internshipOpps)
      Replaces the current list of managed opportunities with a new list.
      Parameters:
      internshipOpps - The new ArrayList of InternshipOpportunity entities to set.

    • getLastID

      public static int getLastID()
      Retrieves the last calculated sequential ID used for an opportunity.
      Returns:
      The last sequential ID number.

    • setLastID

      public static void setLastID(int lastID)
      Sets the last calculated sequential ID used for an opportunity.
      Parameters:
      lastID - The new last sequential ID number.
